analysis.description:
Reclaimable.reclaim (/unique_chucks/42/0xb79730c2d79d12a313b40eda5cb9f180464a25c7.sol#1614-1623) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- reclaimer.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/42/0xb79730c2d79d12a313b40eda5cb9f180464a25c7.sol#1621)

BasicSnapshotToken._balances (/unique_chucks/42/0xb79730c2d79d12a313b40eda5cb9f180464a25c7.sol#2418-2419) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- mTransfer (/unique_chucks/42/0xb79730c2d79d12a313b40eda5cb9f180464a25c7.sol#2630-2667)
	- allBalancesOf (/unique_chucks/42/0xb79730c2d79d12a313b40eda5cb9f180464a25c7.sol#2560-2576)
	- balanceOfAtInternal (/unique_chucks/42/0xb79730c2d79d12a313b40eda5cb9f180464a25c7.sol#2596-2617)
	- mGenerateTokens (/unique_chucks/42/0xb79730c2d79d12a313b40eda5cb9f180464a25c7.sol#2713-2724)
	- mDestroyTokens (/unique_chucks/42/0xb79730c2d79d12a313b40eda5cb9f180464a25c7.sol#2729-2758)
IdentityRecord.deserializeClaims (/unique_chucks/42/0xb79730c2d79d12a313b40eda5cb9f180464a25c7.sol#1251-1258) is declared view but contains assembly code
IsContract.isContract (/unique_chucks/42/0xb79730c2d79d12a313b40eda5cb9f180464a25c7.sol#1387-1390) is declared view but contains assembly code
NeumarkIssuanceCurve.cumulative (/unique_chucks/42/0xb79730c2d79d12a313b40eda5cb9f180464a25c7.sol#1471-1507) is declared view but contains assembly code

Agreement.acceptAgreementInternal (/unique_chucks/42/0xb79730c2d79d12a313b40eda5cb9f180464a25c7.sol#487-496) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _signatories[accepter] == 0
